repair.repairedDockerfile:
FROM debian:buster-slim
RUN apt-get update -y && apt-get install --no-install-recommends ca-certificates -y
RUN update-ca-certificates
ADD https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases/download/v0.106.0/hugo_extended_0.106.0_linux-amd64.deb /tmp
RUN dpkg -i /tmp/hugo_extended_0.106.0_linux-amd64.deb
ENTRYPOINT ["hugo"]
